column2: ENGLISH

To the respectable [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
My [Root.GetLordLady], you are a [Root.GetManWoman] blessed with prosperous lands and a beautiful family! It would honor me greatly to take care of either the county of [selling_province.GetName] or your [marriage_child.GetDaughterSon], [marriage_child.GetTitledFirstName]. This would ensure a lasting peace between us.

Signed,
[raiding_adventurer.GetTitledName]

To the respectable [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
My [Root.GetLordLady], your prosperous lands mark you as a [Root.GetTitle] of impressive abilities. I have an offer for you which would ensure a lasting peace between us. Let me rule the county of [selling_province.GetName] in your name, and no one shall dare to touch it again.

Signed,
[raiding_adventurer.GetTitledName]

To the respectable [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
My [Root.GetLordLady], you are a [Root.GetManWoman] blessed with a beautiful family! It would honor me greatly to take care of your [marriage_child.GetDaughterSon], [marriage_child.GetTitledFirstName]. This would ensure a lasting peace between us.

Signed,
[raiding_adventurer.GetTitledName]
[selling_province.GetName] is a fine county, indeed. It can be yours for the right price.

Offer your county §Y[selling_province.GetName]§! to the adventurer §Y[raiding_adventurer.GetTitledFirstName]§! for the price of §G[local_price.GetValue]§!¤. If [raiding_adventurer.GetSheHe] accepts, [raiding_adventurer.GetSheHe] will become your vassal and you will be protected from raiding adventurers for 10 years.\n

Offer the county §Y[selling_province.GetName]§!, which is ruled by your vassal §Y[selling_province.Holder.GetTitledFirstName]§!, to the adventurer §Y[raiding_adventurer.GetTitledFirstName]§! for the price of §G[local_price.GetValue]§!¤. If [raiding_adventurer.GetSheHe] accepts, [raiding_adventurer.GetSheHe] will become your vassal and you will be protected from raiding adventurers for 10 years.

However, your remaining vassals will be displeased, resulting in the following effect:
[marriage_child.GetFirstName] will make you an excellent [marriage_child.GetHusbandWife].
Through the marriage, you form a non-aggression pact with §Y[raiding_adventurer.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
All other vassals opinion of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! changes by §R-15§! for §Y5§! years. §Y(Sold Vassal County)§!\n

To the wise and noble [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
I would be a fool not to accept such a generous offer. I will proudly serve as your vassal, and [selling_province.GetName] shall prosper in my care. This I swear!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

To the clever [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
I have considered your offer together with my closest advisors, and I am afraid to say I am not entirely pleased with the terms. [selling_province.GetName] is a fine county, but not worth the price you demand. May I suggest a more reasonable sum of [local_province_offer.GetValue] gold pieces?

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

To the clever [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
I have considered your offer together with my closest advisors, and I am afraid to say I cannot accept these terms. [selling_province.GetName] is a fine county, but I think you will agree that the benefits of granting it to me peacefully far outweigh the sum of gold you request.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

To my new liege, [Root.GetTitledNameWithNick],

Blessings upon your house! I have decided to convert to the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith so that I may rule my new subjects as wisely as you rule yours.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
I am glad we managed to solve this peacefully.
If it will ensure peace, I must agree.
